name: Tomodachi Nikki
nutshell: We'll always be friends!

name: Spy Room
nutshell:
A world where wars are fought with spies. With a mission success rate of 100%, the remarkable, yet rather difficult to deal with, spy Klaus is being tasked with an almost impossible mission by the agency, harboring an insane 90% chance of failure and death…which for some reason involves eight inexperienced girls?!
Official Light Novel Translation by Yen Press

name: Mujirushi - The Sign of Dreams
nutshell:
A man and his daughter meet a mysterious man who has more than a few secrets and tall tales to tell about France and The Louvre Museum. What awaits for those who dare to follow their dreams?
This miniseries is a collaboration between celebrated mangaka Naoki Urasawa, the Louvre museum in Paris, France, and Fujio Productions.

Official Release:

Indonesian release by Level Comics as Mujirushi: The Sign of Dreams (2020)

name: Butterfly Kiss Blade
nutshell: Homura Tsukishima and Sakurako Hirosue are roommates at Principia Academy, a school located on an island created specifically for researching "shiki", which is a form of power created by manipulating numbers.

name: Jujutsu Kaisen (Fan Colored)
nutshell: In a world where cursed spirits feed on unsuspecting humans, fragments of the legendary and feared demon Ryomen Sukuna have been lost and scattered about. Should any demon consume Sukunas body parts, the power they gain could destroy the world as we know it. fortunatly, there exists a mysteious school of Jujutsu Sorcerers who exist to protect the precarious existence of the living from the supernatural.

name: Since I Became a Commoner, My Engagement was Annulled!
nutshell: Two babies of different statuses were swapped by fairies. Raised as a noble, the 13 years old Anna became an adult. She who doesn't resemble her family at all, worried every day because she couldn't use her magic that well. One day, a fairy appears right in front of her…

name: I Will Not Get Married
nutshell: The tale of a young maiden who refuses to get married to someone she's never met, and the man she meets instead.

name: Shiawase Gohan - Maki to Hanazawa
nutshell:
Maki, a dedicated cook, lives with his boyfriend, Hanazawa and their pet rabbit, Pyon. The cute and carefree Hanazawa is regularly hit on by the handsome pastry chef from the sweet shop they frequent and Maki clashes with him often, but their days pass by peacefully… For the most part.
A light-hearted food-themed BL with occasional serious undertones.

name: I Don't Like You... Mr.President!
nutshell:
“Will you marry me, princess?”
A darling of a President, head over heels in love★ A Cinderella romance full of adoration!
I’m a cleaner who’s just not good at showing or expressing my emotions, and I’m about to spend a dazzling night with the handsome celebrity President. From that…
A super gorgeous proposal?! But, why would he do this to someone like me? I couldn’t help but be skeptical, and for that, I can’t seem to be honest with him… But that doesn’t stop myself from being attracted to him!!"

name: Shiranui Kitanroku
nutshell: A man travels, collecting and sharing creepy and weird tales of the supernatural.

name: Reflection (Remake)
tags: Long Strip,Romance,Comedy,Girls' Love,Web Comic,Slice of Life,Full Color
nutshell: Note: This is a Vietnamese webtoon, so read left to right.

name: Bokura no Meikyu
nutshell: A school suddenly turned into a dungeon!? Can the students fight their way out of a dungeon with rampaging monsters? Selected as a finalist for the Alpha Police Web Contents Prize!

name: Kakumei no Hi
nutshell: Kei is a normal–if very pretty–young boy in high school. One day, he falls ill and is taken to the hospital. They find, much to everyone's surprise, that "he" actually has a female genotype even though "his" phenotype is male!! A little bit of surgical work solves the problem, and cool male hero Kei becomes innocent female heroine Kei. And what a female! "He" was cute before, but she is a beauty now.

name: Kakko Warui Hinata-kun
nutshell:
Meet Hinata-kun, an attractive, straight-A student.
There's nothing he loves more than being called "cool!" ♪
That's why when Kagami, who's even taller and smarter than him, asks him out, he's at a complete loss as to what to do! No matter how many times he turns him down, Kagami refuses to give up, and after he holds a secret over Hinata, the two of them wind up stuck together to study!
This love story follows the trials and tribulations of Kagami-kun, the tease, and a stubborn Hinata-kun as they study for their finals. ☆
Other short stories include adolescent boys who have to share rooms in a school dorm, and more! ☆

name: Dog Life
nutshell:
From : Love Manhwa

Born as a sick child, Gae Ddong (dog poop) was given her ugly name so she would live long (in the old days people believed you needed an ugly name to live long). However, as she grows up she gets treated like her name. Her family is rich and full of geniuses except for her. Will things ever get better for her?

name: This Girl Will Make Me a Woman (Yuri Anthology)
nutshell:
A collection of oneshots from Yorita Miyuki.

This Girl Will Make Me a Woman
That Red on Me
First Love Mint Blue
バレンタインの悲劇 (Valentine's Tragedy)
COOL GIRL on My Lap

name: Bitter: Kare no Hisoyaka na Seppun
nutshell: For Hasunobe Yoshitomo, co-heir and general manager of the first-class Royal Fort hotel chain, life is pretty sweet. The only bitter pill is dealing with the rival hotel chain that recently opened nearby. However, things start to look up when he escorts a beautiful drunken guest back to his room, but who is this mystery guy?

name: I'll Special Edition Package: Crazy Kouzu BC
nutshell: Asada Hiroyuki's first collection of works. Included are 12 works, including "I'll: Special Episode," "Renka: Extra Episode," which were not included in the main volumes, and never-before-seen gags.

name: Free! - Delicious Meals For You (Doujinshi)
nutshell:
Pairing: Haruka x Rin
Matsuoka Rin is an officer who finds himself the target of some very enthusiastic feeding by the weird chef who runs the cafe near his station. Why does Haru always prepare meals for him, and why does he get this strange feeling that he’s met Haru somewhere before…?

name: Hetalia - Velvet Goldmine (Doujinshi)
nutshell:
America tries to convey his feelings for England whom is still haunted by a memory of the past.
England ignores his terrible memories for the time being, but is still worried that they might haunt him whenever he’s with America. He still allows himself be with the one he loves.
Pairing: US x UK

name: Kantai Collection -KanColle- 4-koma Comic: Fubuki, Ganbarimasu!
nutshell: Serialized in Famitsu Comic Clear. Based on the Kantai Collection browser game. Enjoy the heartwarming antics of the World War II-Era Japanese Imperial Navy in the form of cute girls training at the ship girl school.

name: Dubious Moon
nutshell:
A cheeky office romance that erupts out of a slip of the tongue.
​Shiwon finds herself still reeling from the shock of being dumped by boyfriend number four. Her pride is on the floor from having to deal with the consistently emotionless and nitpicking manager Mr. Moon at the office. During a night out with her co-workers, she drunkenly calls him out. She ends up confessing her feelings and asking him out when all she had planned to do was apologize. Surprised by Mr. Moon’s acceptance of her invitation to go on a date…a secret office romance is ignited.

name: Kitty Boy
nutshell:
My boyfriend is a cat? Not only can you sell cute and act like a baby, but you can also make trouble. Behind the cute daily life of raising cats, there are hidden secrets about genetic modification. stop! A woman like me will not let you presumptuous!
(Google Translate. Itll be nice if someone actually translated it…)

name: Touken Ranbu - Fukami ni Fukeru (Doujinshi)
nutshell: Pairing: Mikazuki Munechika x Tsurumaru Kuninaga

name: Gokiburi Buster
nutshell: Humans may be considered at the top of the food chain, but when people are in the presence of cockroaches, they cower in fear. Who can they turn to when faced with these insects? The Gokiburi Busters, who have yet to fail to eliminate a threat!

name: Oshigoto desu yo! Akane-san
tags: Comedy,Office Workers,Girls' Love,4-Koma,Web Comic,Slice of Life
nutshell: Crazy office 4-koma starring Akane, a programmer constantly haunted by encroaching deadlines, and Yamagami, a salesperson hunting for Akane's love by bringing her even more jobs!

name: Takunomi.
nutshell:
20-year-old Amatsuki Michiru moved to Tokyo due to a change of career. She decided to live in a women-only share house "Stella House Haruno" with people of different ages and occupations. It's always fun when there's delicious alcohol and food!!
This work was adapted into an anime in 2018.

name: Happy Candy Virus
nutshell:
After my death, my life began to improve...?!
Mafuyu is called "corpse doll" because of the scars on her face. She meets a young man from out of town, Shizuki, but when he hears rumors that "a dead man walks night by night," the expression on his face changes and he starts running. Then a girl comes up to Mafuyu and goes for her neck...
Panic, romance, horror, and much more! Indomitable DEATH x LIFE!!
